# Copilot instructions for Market Scraper Data EA (MQL5)

Key conventions (MQL5-specific)
- No C++11 features: no `auto`, lambdas, local references, pointer arithmetic, or heavy templates. Use explicit types and simple inline helpers.
- Style: 2-space indent; variables `snake_case`; functions `CamelCase`; one file = one responsibility; avoid complex macros.
